description: Subcomponent for `v-treeview` used to display a single treeview node.

props.hideActions: Hide the expand icon and loading indicator next to each item title.
props.indentLines: Array of indent lines to render next to the item.
props.loading: Places the v-treeview-item into a loading state.
props.nav: Reduces the width of v-list-item takes and adds a border radius.
props.slim: Reduces the vertical padding or height of the v-treeview-item, making it more compact.
props.toggleIcon: Allows customization of the icon used to toggle the expansion and collapse of treeview branches.

events.toggleExpand: Emitted when the item is toggled to expand or collapse.

slots.toggle: Slot for custom expand icon and loading indicator.
